offline.banner: You are offline. Some features may be limited.

home.welcome_back: Welcome back to your wellness center.

smart_navigation.title: Smart Navigation
smart_navigation.generator_desc: Create a new daily plan with AI.

checkin.title: Weekly Check-in
checkin.description: It's been a week! How about logging your weight to track your progress?

explanation.title: AI Analysis for
explanation.error: Could not get the AI explanation at this time.

chat.title: Chat with Nutri.IA
chat.subtitle: Ask your questions about nutrition
chat.initial_greeting: Hello, {{name}}! I'm Nutri.IA, your nutritional assistant. Knowing your goal is {{objective}}, how can I help you today?
chat.error: Sorry, an error occurred while communicating. Please try again.
chat.voice_not_supported: Voice recognition is not supported in this browser.
chat.tts_not_supported: Text-to-speech is not supported in this browser.

reports.title: AI Reports
reports.subtitle: Get weekly analysis of your progress from the AI.

initial.title: Ready for your weekly analysis?
initial.description: Nutri.IA will analyze your progress, highlight wins, and suggest the next steps to reach your goal.

error.generic: An error occurred while generating your report. Please try again.
error.title: Generation Error

limit.title: Limit Reached
limit.description: You've reached the report limit for the free plan. Upgrade for unlimited access.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Choose how the application should look.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Receive proactive reminders and tips from the AI.
notifications.grantedBody: You will now receive tips and reminders from Nutri.IA.

profile_type.title: Profile Type
profile_type.description: Switch between user and professional view.

privacy.title: Security & Privacy
privacy.subtitle: Manage how your data is used and protected.

anonymization.title: Data Anonymization
anonymization.description: Hide your name in public areas like the community to protect your identity.

biometrics.title: Biometric Authentication
biometrics.description: Use your fingerprint or face recognition for a faster, more secure login.

permissions.title: Manage Data Permissions
permissions.description: Control which data the AI can access to personalize your experience.

audit.title: Activity Logs
audit.description: See a record of important activities in your account.
